subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
This character has lost its original meaning of “[[scorpion]]”. The derivative {{och-l|蠆}} refers to the original word.

subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 1
Proper noun
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|ばん|yomi=o}}
From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=はん|-}} {{ltc-l|萬}}. See {{ja-l|万}} for more senses.

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|まん|yomi=o}}
Likely a shift from ''ban'' above. See {{ja-l|万}} for more senses.
